```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

The following packages are required for the code to run:

dplyr
janitor
ggplot2
maps
patchwork

These packages can be installed using the following code:

```{r}
install.packages("dplyr")
install.packages("janitor")
install.packages("ggplot2")
install.packages("maps")
install.packages("patchwork")
```

The countries in the first visualization under the call to function "highlight_arable_land" can be changed, but there are already examples set. No other instructions are required for this project's code.
